jdbcService.sql: insert into ~users ( id, created, modified, password, salt, password_modified, alias, verification_code, invites_left, blocked_since, anonymous, realm, alias_type_id, algorithm ) values ( :id, :created, :modified, :password, :salt, :passwordModified, :alias, :verificationCode, :invitesLeft, :blockedSince, :anonymous, :realm, :aliasTypeId, :algorithm )
